Summary: small light moved down quick bright disk shaped light moved up fast bright disk light moved across horizon in seconds two jets behind at much slower speed
divs: Sighting Detailsi was havin a cig looked at a plane it then made a 75 degree turn down for 3-5 seconds it was way below normal flight pattern it lit up verry bright in a disk shape disapeard for 1 second and appeared again 1-2 thousand feet above and lit up again in the same dick shape then moved from south to north faster than any comercial plane ive ever seen 20 times as fast i then saw 2 strobing lights that appeared to be jets following the same tragectory but much slower then the object disapeard and when the jets were in the area i could hear the jets WIERD!!! it was definatly a ufo i watch the planes all the time and they fly f16s around all the time it was not even close to any of those
